answers.answer: You really need to consult your doctor like asap on this
You need to tell you doctor ASAP it might be preeclampsia... It's due to high blood pressure and if not treated it can end very bad for you and the baby.., I am going through this now myself
Definitely talk to your doctor about the symptoms. It could be high blood pressure
I got the same thing too my doctor said that my sugar was low but I didn't have high blood pressure or anything else

Did you switch prenatal vitamin to the gummies? There's no iron in them, i felt the same way and once i started pumping in the recommonded dose of it i felt soooo much better. But yes, ask your doc. Hope you are okay girly
Thank you girls so much. I honestly thought maybe it was normal :/ how dumb of me but i am gonna call as soon as they open! & aliciarene i havent switched my vitamins at all :/ thank you all so much!

question: Lately I've been really dizzy & have been getting horrible headaches.today I started seeing red spots & my left arm was shaky & weak. No matter what I do I still have a huge painful headache. Any one else?
title: worried.. 34 weeks
